alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 07 at 2:05PM CST until January 08 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 8 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...In Louisiana, West Cameron and East Cameron Parishes. In Texas, Lower Jefferson County. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 8 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Actual tide levels are expected to be between 1.5 and 2.0 feet mean higher high water.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
